programme.sub-title: Life and Letters: The Genuine Austen

programme.title: Norse Mythology
programme.sub-title: Meeting the Norse Gods of the Viking Age
programme.desc: Learn what we owe to the Poetic Edda and its adaptation in the Prose Edda.

programme.title: Norse Mythology
programme.sub-title: Fate and the Norse Worldview
programme.desc: Focus on the profound Norse sense of fatalism and the importance of reckless courage.

programme.title: Norse Mythology
programme.sub-title: The Norse Art of Mythic Storytelling
programme.desc: Compare versions of a key story that highlight the 'dream logic' inherent to much of Norse mythology.

programme.title: Norse Mythology
programme.sub-title: The Norse Gods Are Characters with Flaws
programme.desc: The roles of the Norse gods are often not as clear-cut as popular treatments would have us believe.

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: What Is a Pirate?
programme.desc: Explore the reasons piracy has endured from ancient times until today.

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: Pirate Facts and Fictions
programme.desc: Examine popular pirate legends, and discover which aspects include some truth.

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: Real Pirates of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Learn how the Spanish power hold over the Caribbean was broken.

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: Pirate Attacks and Tactics
programme.desc: Consider the tactics pirates used to apprehend their prey in the age of sails.

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: Buried Treasure and Pirate Economics
programme.desc: Explore pay, expenses, and insurance the few aspects of life pirates controlled.

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: Pirates as Freedom Fighters
programme.desc: What were the real goals of pirates who attacked and overthrew maritime powers?

programme.title: The Real History of Pirates
programme.sub-title: Pirates and Enslavement
programme.desc: Explore the complex relationships between pirates and enslavers.
